gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 111, Pacers 102
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets defeated the Pacers, 111-102. Grant Williams recorded a team-high 21 points for the Hornets, while Miles Bridges added 20 points, 10 rebounds, seven assists and three steals in the victory. Tyrese Haliburton tallied 13 points, six rebounds and 12 assists for the Pacers in the losing effort, his 30th points/assists double-double of the season. The Hornets have won back-to-back games as they improve to 12-41 on the season, while the Pacers fall to 30-25.
